title: League installer help
body: im running at 0kbps but its extremely slowing going up in percent like every hour it goes up 1, ever since i got to the 66 its stuck its current 71% anyone to help me

replies.body:
Ok so the data is getting through but it does seem high to me, normally I would expect to see a time of 8ms-20ms.

 - Do you have any other downloads running?
 - Does anyone in the house have downloads running?
 - You aren't capped by your ISP are you?
 - What ISP are you using?

nope none i checked steam tried to download , a steady 2mbps , no one is on it and i am using my hotspot unlimited data (dont laugh it is extremely good for a phone and downloads faster then a lot of modems)

That was going to be my next point, try changing your DNS as Slim Chaedi has suggested to Google DNS. If then then improves your download speed, it could be a DNS Routing issue with the provider of your mobile data. We can then look into who that is and what could be causing the issue.
Have you tried configuring your DNS at any point? The Google 8.8.8.8, 8.8.4.4 is fine for me, and my friend could not connect early and reconfiguring to use that DNS worked for her.

Hey Ponyo,

When you go to any otehr website/page on the internet does it load normal speeds?

Could you try going into a command prompt and typing:

ping www.google.com.au 

and copy/pasting the results here so I can see what your normal latency is like.

I have seen it once or twice before where a corrupted patcher causes slow download speeds (I actually had it once myself), the way I resolved it was unfortunately to uninstall, delete all files/folders relating to league and then re-installing the client.

I hope this helps.

-ToxicHawk

Packets: Sent = 4, Received = 4, Lost = 0 (0% loss),
Approximate round trip times in milli-seconds:
    Minimum = 67ms, Maximum = 165ms, Average = 118ms
Idk. I guess just wait it out. I had to reinstall on my friends computer and it has been 4 hours and on 43% atm.
